items.content_html: About This To-Do application is a simple, lightweight tool for managing tasks, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It was created to practice front-end web development skills and offers basic functionalities such as adding, editing, deleting, and marking tasks as complete. The application runs entirely in the web browser with no backend .
items.title: 21981a0580/todo: About This To-Do application is a simple, lightweight tool for managing tasks, developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
